website_summaries.verdict: If you want a modern twist on pilot sunglasses, you can't go wrong with this pair, but durability and fit may be questionable.
pros: Fashionable women praise these sunglasses for their edgy style that looks sleek and modern
Metal frames are lightweight and comfortable
Available in brown, silver, and gray
cons: Mixed reviews on the fit – some say they are large for small faces, while others wish they were wider from lens to lens

customer_reviews.title: Authentic & new
customer_reviews.text: Purchases by Gaffos not good, came damaged paid for expedited shipping and I have to go to the post office and pay for return. 4th pair of Versace Sunglasses first problem I have had . Repurposed same sunglasses by international. Will take longer but never had any problems all Versace & Tiffany Sunglasses are all authentic . Thank you I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Will Amazon will replace these Versace sunglasses when manufacturer won't despite warranty.?  No!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! Defective! Warranty will NOT be homored! Upon first wear the arm fell off!! Upon inspection, the arm appeared to be held together with glue! Given the brand, Versace, and the fact they were under a two year warranty, I was extremely distraught over the fact the manufacturer REFUSED to even repair! He claimed, with even looking at the sunglasses that it was "not a manufacturing fault" !
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and overall look of the glasses, however the condition of the case and the box the product came in make me question the actual quality of the glasses and whether it is indeed the claimed Versace. The case has multiple scratches inside (see pic) and looks like as if someone has already used it for at least a year. The box has a partially removed old label (supposedly NEW item) on both inner sides. What a shame! I would not buy from this seller again given the questionable origin of the product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the style for half the price!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these sunglasses at Nordstrom’s and loved them, but didn’t want to spend $400. I looked on Amazon and found them for less than 1/2 the price! I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and deeply discounted, so you can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get a matching pair for my husband and I before our vacation, could not be happier I did! 100% authentic for a small fraction of the sticker price!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hicks

customer_reviews.title: The lens are jet black not grey like shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The lens are jet black not grey like shown in the picture. Got back from holidays and opened the packet, was very disappointed. Find it very misleading to show grey lens and deliver jet black lens. Will not buy sunglasses again on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: classy
customer_reviews.text: tried these on in the store and they wanted almost 300, too rich for my blood especially since I usually lose them. But this are stylish without doing too much.
customer_reviews.author: txgreat

customer_reviews.title: Love Versace
customer_reviews.text: I thought my last Versace sunglasses were my favorite but these ones are totally my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They are very sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are very sharp looking. Then I was watching Vanderpump Rules on Bravo and one of the cast members (Lala Kent) was wearing them! 😎
customer_reviews.author: MEM4073

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses make a great fashion statement. Nicely constructed light weight but not in a cheap way. I ordered these in the silver and light grey color and can't wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These glasses appear to be authentic in every way. I can't say enough how pleased we are with this purchase. $285 at Macy's and Sunglass Hut - $140 on Amazon. Yes, please. They come in an authentic Versace case, with cleaning cloth and warranty info. I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: They’re real
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect! I was skeptical that I could find such a good deal on real Versace sunglasses but I was able to verify them on the website and they look exactly how they looked at Sunglass Hut when I tried them on. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Khopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these Blue Mirrored Versace Sunglasses! Well made and look Fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE THESE SUNGLASSES
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute one! Way cheaper than in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea F.

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at the quality of these glasses. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of these glasses. Got so many compliments on them and they will be my summer shades! Shipping was quick and everything is legit and original Versace.
customer_reviews.author: Nisey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but where to find replacement pieces
customer_reviews.text: One of corner decor pieces that holds the lens in place fell out, not even a year old. Need a replacement. Other than that the glasses are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are of an average quality at best. Otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerangNebula

customer_reviews.title: For women.
customer_reviews.text: Searched under men’s sunglasses. Only to order and find out they are for women. They are nice. I think I’ll just hold them and gift them at the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffgong

customer_reviews.title: Versace sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely beautiful.. they fit me perfectly! And above all, they are light weight! 100% satisfied ! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, trendy, great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses! They are very light and fit comfortably in your face. I was worried that they were going to be too big, but they were perfect. Excellent price for the high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Michaella Uthleb

customer_reviews.title: Very slow shipping but when I got it it was the right thing
customer_reviews.text: My Glasses are great exactly what I wanted but the shipping was beyond slow it took Weeks to get
customer_reviews.author: sharla hearne

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't complete my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. Because rhe glasses looked like fade. And they arrived a little scratch.
customer_reviews.author: jose Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Girl friend loved them for Valentine's day she had no idea they ...
customer_reviews.text: Girl friend loved them for Valentine's day she had no idea they were even from amazon, would recommend to anyone. They are 100% real do not hesitate( only reason this is 4 stars is because my girl friend is very hard to please)
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I bought this sunglasses in gold and grey and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunglasses in gold and grey and I received it black, on top of that the crystal was all scratched.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Same quality but much cheaper than sunglass hut or other in store retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these not to heavy perfect fit for my face
customer_reviews.author: Keriston

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price good product, came with strong case and cleaning rag
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great glasses. They were better priced on amazon then sun glass hut.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of services! The glasses were perfect, and delivery was quick!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Foster

customer_reviews.title: She was very happy.
customer_reviews.text: They were a birthday gift for my girlfriend, all authentic. She was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase! Just that they wernt perfect one side of the sunglasses came a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked Very much Buy I thought it was mirrored
customer_reviews.author: camila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful "Stunners" that are alway complimented with great functionality!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as it is in the specialty stores that carry it! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Empty Box
customer_reviews.text: Received an empty box, missing the sunglasses, what a mess!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHERIF El WARDANY

product_meta.title: Versace VE2161
product_meta.description:
* These Versace® sunglasses boast a unique aviator-style silhouette with a metal frame and temples. Plastic lenses that offer 100% UV protection. Double bridge. Clear adjustable nose pads. Iconic Medusa logo at the lenses. 
 * Most complementary face shapes: oval, heart, square. 
 * Protective case included. 
 * Made in Italy. 
 * WARNING California's Proposition 65
 * Measurements:  *  Eye Size: 61 mm
    *  Bridge: 22 2⁄5 mm
    *  Temple Size: 144 1⁄2 mm
    *  Weight: 1.6 oz
feature_bullets: Lens: Light Grey Mirror Silver Translucent lens.
